list.name: Host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlserver_server_properties" WITH KEY = "host"

list.name: DB
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlserver_database_io" WITH KEY = "database_name" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.name: Command
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlserver_requests" WITH KEY = "command" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.name: MemoryClerk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlserver_memory_clerks" WITH KEY = "clerk_type" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.name: Volume
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlserver_volume_space" WITH KEY = "volume_mount_point" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/

list.name: WaitCategory
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "sqlserver_waitstats" WITH KEY = "wait_category"
